summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to discrimination and remedies therefor; amending Seattle Municipal Code (SMC) Chapter 14.04 (Fair Employment Practices Ordinance 102562, as last amended by Ordinance 109116) and SMC Chapter 14.08 (Open Housing Ordinance 104839 as last amended by Ordinance 109050) amending SMC Sections 14.04.020, 14.04.030, 14.04.050, 14,04.100, 14.04.140, 14.04.150, 14.04.180, 14.08.010, 14.08.020, 14.08.040, 14.08.060, 14.08.070, 14.08.080, 14.08.090, 14.08.120, 14.08.140, 14.08.160, 14.08.180; and adding new subsections 14.04.020 (E) (F) (G), 14.04.030 (K) (N) (P), 14.04.050 (E) (F), 14.04.120 (C), 14.08.010 (A-F), and 14.08.190 (H) (I) (J).
